title: Solamon Meets with Key Leaders in Colombo
content: Toronto, Canada, April 01, 2012 –(PR.com)– After meeting visionary business and government leaders in Sri Lanka over the past week, Solamon Energy CEO Graeme Boyce and SVP Thijs Boonen in the coming days will wrap a critical series of talks and prepare to visit the prominent city of Kandy, and possibly further review available lands…
